snippet.title: Lotus Reverie: First Nexus Trailer English
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227570/Lotus_Reverie_First_Nexus/

Lotus Reverie is a Visual Novel focused on time management, following the steps of other games such as Devil Survivor or Persona. During a limited amount of time, you will have to forge bonds with other survivors and find out about the mysteries this world and their few inhabitants hide through this survival game where only one pair will remain.

Social networks
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/keinart
Web: https://www.lotusreverie.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lotus_Reverie
Discord: https://discord.gg/keinartlobre

Video editor: NNix
https://twitter.com/nitronnix

Music composer: Red Robotix
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/RedRobotix
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/redrobotix/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/redrobotix
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/redrobotix
Bandcamp: https://redrobotix.bandcamp.com/
